Verses: 1 pelisdhar Yuththampannukiradharkuth Thangal Senaikalaich Cherththu, Yoodhaavilulla Sokkovile Orumiththuk Kooti, Sokkovukkum Asekkaavukkum Natuve Irukkira Epesdhammeemile Paalayamiranginaarkal.
2 savulum Isravel Manusharum Orumiththuk Kooti, Elaa Pallaththaakkile Paalayamirangi, Pelisdharukku Edhiraaka Yuththaththirku Anivakuththu Nindraarkal.
3 pelisdhar Andhappakkaththil Oru Malaiyinmelum, Isravelar Indhappakkaththil Oru Malaiyinmelum Nindraarkal; Avarkalukku Natuve Pallaththaakku Irundhadhu.
4 appozhudhu Kaadh Ooraanaakiya Koliyaadh Ennum Perulla Oru Veeran Pelisdharin Paalayaththilirundhu Purappattuvandhu Natuve Nirpaan; Avan Uyaram Aarumuzhamum Oru Jaanumaam.
5 avan Than Thalaiyinmel Venkalach Cheeraavaip Pottu, Oru Porkkavasam Thariththukkontiruppaan; Andhak Kavasaththin Nirai Aiyaayiram Sekkalaana Venkalamaayirukkum.
6 avan Than Kaalkalile Venkalakkavasaththaiyum Than Tholkalinmel Venkalak Ketakaththaiyum Thariththiruppaan.
7 avanutaiya Eettiththaangu Nesavukkaararin Pataimaraththin Kanadhiyum Avan Eettiyin Alaku Arunoorusekkal Irumpumaayirukkum; Parisaipitikkiravan Avanukku Munnaaka Natappaan.

8 avan Vandhunindru, Isravel Senaikalaip Paarththuch Chaththamittu, Neengal Yuththaththirku Anivakuththu Nirkiradhu Enna? Naan Pelisdhan Allavaa? Neengal Savulin Sevakar Allavaa? Ungalil Oruvanaith Therindhukollungal, Avan Ennitaththil Varattum.

9 avan Ennote Yuththam Pannavum Ennaik Kollavum Samarththanaanaal Naangal Ungalukku Velaikkaararaai Iruppom; Naan Avanai Jeyiththu Kolvenaanaal, Neengal Engalukku Velaikkaararaai Irundhu, Engalai Sevikkaventum Endru Solli,
10 pinnum Andhap Pelisdhan: Naan Indraiyadhinam Isravelutaiya Senaikalai Nindhiththen; Naam Oruvarotu Oruvar Yuththampanna Oruvanai Vitungal Endru Sollikkontuvaruvaan.
11 savulum Isravelar Anaivarum Andhap Pelisdhanutaiya Vaarththaikalaik Kettu, Kalangi Mikavum Payappattaarkal.

12 thaaveedhu Enpavan Yoodhaavilulla Pedhlekem Ooraanaakiya Eesaai Ennum Perulla Eppiraaththiya Manushanutaiya Kumaaranaayirundhaan; Eesaayukku Ettukkumaarar Irundhaarkal; Ivan Savulin Naatkalile Matra Janangalukkulle Vayadhusendra Kizhavanaai Madhikkappattaan.

13 eesaayinutaiya Moondru Mooththa Kumaarar Savulotekoota Yuththaththirkup Poyirundhaarkal; Yuththaththirkup Poyirundha Avanutaiya Moondru Kumaararil Mooththavanukku Eliyaap Endrum, Irantaangumaaranukku Apinadhaap Endrum, Moondraangumaaranukkuch Chammaa Endrum Per.
14 thaaveedhu Ellaarukkum Ilaiyavan; Mooththavarkalaakiya Andha Moondruperum Savulotekootap Poyirundhaarkal.
15 thaaveedhu Savulaivittuth Thirumpip Poi Pedhlekemilirukkira Than Thakappanutaiya Aatukalai Meyththukkontirundhaan.
16 andhap Pelisdhan Kaalaiyilum Maalaiyilum Naarpadhunaal Vandhuvandhu Nirpaan.

17 eesaai Than Kumaaranaakiya Thaaveedhai Nokki: Un Sakodhararukku Indha Oru Marakkaal Varuththa Payatraiyum, Indhap Paththu Appangalaiyum Etuththukkontu, Paalayaththilirukkira Un Sakodhararitaththil Ottamaaip Poi,
18 indhap Paththup Paalkattikalai Aayiramperukku Adhipadhiyaanavanitaththil Kotuththu, Un Sakodharar Sukamaayirukkiraarkalaa Endru Visaariththu, Avarkalitaththil Ataiyaalam Vaangik Kontuvaa Endraan.
19 appozhudhu Savulum, Avarkalum, Isravelar Ellaarum, Elaa Pallaththaakkile Pelisdharotu Yuththampannikkontirundhaarkal.

20 thaaveedhu Adhikaalaiyil Ezhundhu, Aatukalaik Kaavalaali Vasamaai Vittu, Eesaai Thanakkuk Karpiththapatiye Etuththukkontupoi, Iradhangal Irukkira Itaththile Vandhaan; Senaikal Anivakuththu Nindru, Yuththaththirkendru Aarppariththaarkal.
21 isravelarum Pelisdharum Oruvarukku Edhiraaka Oruvar Anivakuththuk Kontirundhaarkal.
22 appozhudhu Thaaveedhu: Thaan Kontuvandhavaikalai Irakki, Rasdhukkalaik Kaakkiravan Vasamaaka Vaiththu Vittu, Senaikkul Oti, Than Sakodhararaip Paarththu: Sukamaayirukkireerkalaa Endru Kettaan.

23 avan Ivarkalote Pesikkontirukkaiyil, Idho, Kaadh Ooraanaakiya Koliyaadh Ennum Perulla Andhap Pelisdha Veeran Pelisdharin Senaikalilirundhu Ezhumpivandhu Nindru, Mun Sonna Vaarththaikalaiye Sonnaan; Adhaith Thaaveedhu Kettaan.
24 isravelar Ellaarum Andha Manushanaik Kaanumpodhu Mikavum Payappattu, Avan Mukaththukku Vilaki Otippovaarkal.

25 anneraththile Isravelar: Vandhu Nirkira Andha Manushanaik Kanteerkalaa, Isravelai Nindhikka Vandhu Nirkiraan; Ivanaik Kollukiravan Evano, Avanai Raajaa Mikavum Aisuvariyavaanaakki, Avanukkuth Thammutaiya Kumaaraththiyaith Thandhu, Avan Thakappan Veettaarukku Isravelile Sarvamaaniyam Kotuppaar Endraarkal.

26 appozhudhu Thaaveedhu Thannantaiyile Nirkiravarkalaip Paarththu, Indhap Pelisdhanaik Kondru Isravelukku Neritta Nindhaiyai Neekkukiravanukku Enna Seyyappatum; Jeevanulla Thevanutaiya Senaikalai Nindhikkiradharku Viruththasedhanam Illaadha Indha Pelisdhan Emmaaththiram Endraan.
27 adharku Janangal: Avanaik Kollukiravanukku Inna Innapati Seyyappatum Endru Mun Sonna Vaarththaikalaiye Avanukkuch Chonnaarkal.

28 andha Manusharote Avan Pesikkontirukkiradhai Avan Mooththa Sakodharanaakiya Eliyaap Kettapodhu, Avan Thaaveedhinmel Kopangontu: Nee Inge Vandhadhu Enna? Vanaandharaththilulla Andhak Konja Aatukalai Nee Yaar Vasaththil Vittaai? Yuththaththaip Paarkka Allavaa Vandhaai? Un Thunikaraththaiyum, Un Irudhayaththin Akangaaraththaiyum Naan Ariven Endraan.
29 adharkuth Thaaveedhu: Naan Ippozhudhu Seydhadhu Enna? Naan Vandhadharku Mukaandharam Illaiyaa Endru Solli,
30 avanai Vittu, Veroruvanitaththil Thirumpi, Andhappirakaaramaakave Kettaan; Janangal Munpolave Uththaravu Sonnaarkal.
31 thaaveedhu Sonna Vaarththaikalai Avarkal Kettu, Adhaich Chavulin Samukaththil Ariviththaarkal; Appozhudhu Avan Avanai Azhaippiththaan.
32 thaaveedhu Savulai Nokki: Ivanimiththam Oruvanutaiya Irudhayamum Kalanga Ventiyadhillai; Ummutaiya Atiyaanaakiya Naan Poi, Indhap Pelisdhanote Yuththampannuven Endraan.
33 appozhudhu Savul Thaaveedhai Nokki: Nee Indhap Pelisdhanote Edhirththu Yuththam Panna Unnaal Aakaadhu; Nee Ilaignan, Avano Than Siru Vayadhumudhal Yuththaveeran Endraan.

34 thaaveedhu Savulaippaarththu: Ummutaiya Atiyaan En Thakappanutaiya Aatukalai Meyththukkontirukkira Podhu, Oruvisai Oru Singamum Oru Visai Oru Karatiyum Vandhu, Mandhaiyilirukkira Oru Aattaip Pitiththukkontadhu.
35 naan Adhaith Thotarndhupoi, Adhai Atiththu, Adhai Adhin Vaaikkuth Thappuviththen; Adhu Enmel Paaindha Podhu, Naan Adhin Thaatiyaip Pitiththu, Adhai Atiththuk Kondrupotten.

36 andhach Chingaththaiyum Andhak Karatiyaiyum Ummutaiya Atiyaanaakiya Naan Kondren; Viruththasedhanamillaadha Indhap Pelisdhanum Avaikalil Ondraippola Iruppaan; Avan Jeevanulla Thevanutaiya Senaikalai Nindhiththaane Endraan.

37 pinnum Thaaveedhu: Ennaich Chingaththin Kaikkum Karatiyin Kaikkum Thappuviththa Karththar Indhap Pelisdhanutaiya Kaikkum Thappuvippaar Endraan; Appozhudhu Savul Thaaveedhaip Paarththu: Po, Karththar Unnutanekoota Iruppaaraaka Endraan.
38 savul Thaaveedhukkuth Than Vasdhirangalai Utuththuviththu, Venkalamaana Oru Seeraavai Avan Thalaiyinmel Pottu, Oru Kavasaththaiyum Avanukkuth Tharippiththaan.

39 avanutaiya Pattayaththai Thaaveedhu Than Vasdhirangalmel Kattikkontu, Adhile Avanukkup Pazhakkamillaadhadhinaal Natandhupaarththaan; Appozhudhu Thaaveedhu Savulai Nokki: Naan Ivaikalaip Pottukkontu Pokak Kootaadhu; Indha Appiyaasam Enakku Illai Endru Solli, Avaikalaik Kalaindhupottu,

40 than Thatiyaik Kaiyile Pitiththukkontu, Aatrilirukkira Aindhu Koozhaangallukalaith Therindhetuththu, Avaikalai Meypparukkuriya Thannutaiya Ataippappaiyile Pottu, Than Kavanaith Than Kaiyile Pitiththukkontu, Andhap Pelisdhanantaiyile Ponaan.
41 pelisdhanum Natandhu, Thaaveedhantaikku Kittivandhaan; Parisaiyai Pitikkiravan Avanukku Munnaaka Natandhaan.
42 pelisdhan Sutrippaarththu: Thaaveedhaik Kantu, Avan Ilaignanum Savundhariya Roopamaana Sivandha Meniyullavanumaayirundhapatiyinaal, Avanai Asattai Panninaan.
43 pelisdhan Thaaveedhaip Paarththu: Nee Thatikalote Ennitaththil Vara Naan Naayaa Endru Solli, Avan Than Thevarkalaikkontu Thaaveedhaich Chapiththaan.
44 pinnum Andhap Pelisdhan Thaaveedhaip Paarththu: Ennitaththil Vaa; Naan Un Maamsaththai Aakaayaththup Paravaikalukkum Kaattumirukangalukkum Kotuppen Endraan.

45 adharkuth Thaaveedhu: Pelisdhanai Nokki: Nee Pattayaththotum, Eettiyotum, Ketakaththotum Ennitaththil Varukiraai; Naano Nee Nindhiththa Isravelutaiya Iraanuvangalin Thevanaakiya Senaikalutaiya Karththarin Naamaththile Unnitaththil Varukiren.

46 indraiyadhinam Karththar Unnai En Kaiyil Oppukkotuppaar; Naan Unnaik Kondru, Un Thalaiyai Unnai Vittu Vaangi, Pelisdharutaiya Paalayaththin Pinangalai Indraiyadhinam Aakaayaththup Paravaikalukkum, Poomiyin Kaattumirukangalukkum Kotuppen; Adhanaal Isravelil Thevan Oruvar Untu Endru Poolokaththaar Ellaarum Arindhukolluvaarkal.
47 karththar Pattayaththinaalum Eettiyinaalum Ratchikkiravar Alla Endru Indha Janakkoottamellaam Arindhukollum; Yuththam Karththarutaiyadhu; Avar Ungalai Engal Kaiyil Oppukkotuppaar Endraan.
48 appozhudhu Andhap Pelisdhan Ezhumpi, Thaaveedhukku Edhiraakak Kittivarukaiyil, Thaaveedhu Theeviramaai Andhach Chenaikkum Andhap Pelisdhanukkum Edhiraaka Oti,

49 than Kaiyai Ataippaththile Pottu, Adhilirundhu Oru Kallai Etuththu, Kavanile Vaiththuch Chuzhatri, Pelisdhanutaiya Netriyile Pata Erindhaan; Andhak Kal Avan Netriyil Padhindhu Ponadhinaal, Avan Tharaiyile Mukanguppura Vizhundhaan.
50 ivvidhamaakath Thaaveedhu Oru Kavaninaalum Oru Kallinaalum Pelisdhanai Merkontu, Avanai Matangatiththu, Avanaik Kondrupottaan; Thaaveedhin Kaiyil Pattayam Illaadhirundhadhu.

51 aakaiyaal Thaaveedhu Pelisdhanantaiyil Oti Avanmel Nindru, Avan Pattayaththai Etuththu, Adhai Adhin Uraiyilirundhu Uruvi, Avanaik Kondru Adhinaale Avan Thalaiyai Vettippottaan; Appozhudhu Thangal Veeran Seththupponaan Endru Pelisdhar Kantu, Otipponaarkal.

52 appozhudhu Isravelarum Yoodhaa Manusharum Ezhumpi, Aarppariththu, Pallaththaakkin Ellaimattum, Ekronin Vaasalkalmattum, Pelisdharaith Thuraththinaarkal; Saaraayeemin Vazhiyilum, Kaadh Pattanamattum, Ekron Pattanamattum, Pelisdhar Vettuntu Vizhundhaarkal.
53 isravel Puththirar Pelisdharai Moorkkamaaith Thuraththinapirpaatu, Thirumpi Vandhu, Avarkalutaiya Paalayangalaik Kollaiyittaarkal.
54 thaaveedhu Pelisdhanutaiya Thalaiyai Etuththu, Adhai Erusalemukkuk Kontuvandhaan; Avan Aayudhangalaiyo Than Kootaaraththile Vaiththaan.

55 thaaveedhu Pelisdhanukku Edhiraakap Purappattuppokiradhaich Chavul Kantapodhu, Avan Senaapadhiyaakiya Apneraip Paarththu: Apnere, Indha Vaalipan Yaarutaiya Makan Endru Kettaan; Adharku Apner: Raajaave, Enakkuth Theriyaadhu Endru Ummutaiya Jeevanaikkontu Sollukiren Endraan.
56 appozhudhu Raajaa: Andhap Pillaiyaantaan Yaarutaiya Makan Endru Visaari Endraan.
57 thaaveedhu Pelisdhanaik Kondru Thirumpukaiyil, Apner Avanaich Chavulukku Munpaaka Azhaiththukkontu Poivittaan; Pelisdhanutaiya Thalai Avan Kaiyil Irundhadhu.
58 appozhudhu Savul: Vaalipane, Nee Yaarutaiya Makan Endru Avanaik Kettadharku, Thaaveedhu: Naan Pedhlekem Ooraanaayirukkira Ummutaiya Atiyaanaakiya Eesaayin Makan Endraan.
